title: Can the Eagles make another playoff run & are the Cowboys for real?
itunes:title: Can the Eagles make another playoff run & are the Cowboys for real?
description:
The Good Morning Football Crew starts up the show with a recap of the best moments from the Wild Card Weekend (0:23) including the Eagles and Bears thriller, their confidence in the Cowboys (10:56), and the Chargers performance (24:51). The gang then gets into what they learned from the weekend such as the importance of mid-season trades (34:47), and how the Cowboys LB’s are the big bad wolves of the NFL (42:32). Lastly, Kay Adams, Nate Burleson, Kyle Brandt and Peter Schrager discuss this weekend’s underappreciated stories (49:53). Be sure to check in every Wednesday to the GMFB podcast! Like, share, subscribe!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
